item.title: With Trump’s Gaza Plan on the Line, Negotiators Gather in Egypt for Talks
item.description: Though significant issues remain to be hashed out between Israel and Hamas, some are saying that after two years of death and destruction, a breakthro...

item.title: French Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu Resigns
item.description: Sébastien Lecornu’s departure ratcheted up pressure on President Emmanuel Macron to call snap parliamentary elections.

item.title: Jilly Cooper, British Romance Novelist, Is Dead at 88
item.description: A prolific writer and keen observer, she sold millions of copies of her juicy, sometimes racy “Rutshire Chronicles” series.

item.title: Appeal Trial Opens in Gisèle Pelicot Rape Case
item.description: One man has appealed his conviction in a case in which a Frenchman drugged his wife and invited scores of men to rape her.

item.title: Gisèle Pelicot Returns to French Court for Man’s Appeal
item.description: Gisèle Pelicot appeared in court to face the appeal of one of the men convicted of raping her while she was in a drugged state — encounters that her h...
